name: Shinkai: Pet Friendly Itinerary Generator
description: Generates a pet-friendly itinerary based on destination, duration, and pet type
author: Shinkai

sqlTables.name: pet_friendly_itineraries
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE pet_friendly_itineraries (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, destination TEXT NOT NULL, duration_days INTEGER NOT NULL, pet_type TEXT NOT NULL, details JSONB, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

sqlQueries.name: Get itinerary by destination
sqlQueries.query: SELECT * FROM pet_friendly_itineraries WHERE destination = :destination ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
